contentList.content: The Loot Master Spell will loot corpses within a radius of [1] foot from the caster. Loot will be transferred to the weightless LootMaster Backpack.
Loot Master has allready lootet Inventory
LootMaster Commons Backpack: Automatically collects junk, common items, and valuables from corpses and containers, while ignoring vanity clothing.
The Loot Master Spell will loot containers within a radius of [1] foot from the caster. Loot will be transferred to the weightless LootMaster Backpack.
The Loot Master Spell will loot both corpses and containers within a radius of [1] foot from the caster. Loot will be transferred to the weightless LootMaster Backpack.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TURNED">Turn</LSTag> nearby fey and fiends. They are forced to flee and cannot come close to you.

Choose a Looting Option:
Loot Corpses - non-ally
Loot Containers - non-empty
Loot All - corpses and containers
Remove Mod - unistall 'Loot Master'
This spell will remove the mod 'Loot Master' and prepare it for uninstallation.
The Loot Master Spell will loot both corpses and containers within a radius of [1] foot from the caster. Loot will be transferred to the weightless LootMaster Backpack.
The Loot Master Spell will loot containers within a radius of [1] foot from the caster. Loot will be transferred to the weightless LootMaster Backpack.
The Loot Master Spell will loot both corpses and containers within a radius of [1] foot from the caster. Loot will be transferred to the weightless LootMaster Backpack.
LootMaster Rares Backpack: Automatically collects rare and story-related items from corpses and containers, ignoring vanity clothing.
The Loot Master Spell will loot corpses within a radius of [1] foot from the caster. Loot will be transferred to the weightless LootMaster Backpack.
